casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Bennie Lee GRAHAM No. 199P19 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 14, 2019 Paul E. Smith, Attorney at Law, Chapel Hill, For Graham, Bennie Lee. Scott T. Stroud, Special Deputy Attorney General, For State of North Carolina. Bennie Lee Graham, For Graham, Bennie Lee. Ben R. David, District Attorney, For State of North Carolina.

ORDER

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 23rd of May 2019 by Defendant for En Banc Review:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2019."

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 23rd of May 2019 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2019."
